General.Name: ChemPartner PharmaTech Co Ltd
General.Description: Chempartner Pharmatech Co., Ltd. engages in the microecological nutrition and healthcare businesses worldwide. The company provides medical contract research organization, and contract development and manufacturing organization services for pre-clinical stages. It is also involved in the research, production, and sales of prebiotic fibers as a microecological fortification ingredient, ODM product, and food for special medical purposes product. The company was formerly known as Quantum Hi-Tech (China) Biological Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Quantum Hi-Tech (China) Biological Co., Ltd. in September 2020. Quantum Hi-Tech (China) Biological Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
